utils module¶

Created on Sat Feb 27 04:03:11 2021

@author: Nishad Mandlik

utils.pcap_dir_to_pickle(in_dir_path, out_file_path=None, out_dir_path=None, recursive=True)[source]¶

Extract the devices from a pcap dump files in a directory and write the resultant dataframe to a pickle file.

Parameters

  • in_dir_path (str) – Path of the directory which contains the pcap files.

  • out_file_path (str, optional) – Path of the output pickle file. Defaults to None.

  • out_dir_path (str, optional) – Path of the directory in which the output pickle file should be stored. Defaults to None.

  • recursive (boolean, optional) – Whether the input directory should be read recursively or not. Defaults to True.

Raises

TypeError – Raised when both or none among ‘out_file_path’ and ‘out_dir_path’ is of NoneType. Additionally, in recursive mode, it is raised when ‘out_dir_path’ is not provided.

Note

Exactly one among ‘out_file_path’ and ‘out_dir_path’ should be specified. In recursive mode, it is mandatory to specify ‘out_dir_path’. Thus, in this mode, ‘out_file_path’ must be None.

Returns

None.

utils.pcap_file_to_pickle(in_file_path, out_file_path=None, out_dir_path=None)[source]¶

Extract the devices from a pcap dump files in a directory and write the resultant dataframe to a pickle file.

Parameters

  • in_dir_path (str) – Path of the input pcap file.

  • out_file_path (str, optional) – Path of the output pickle file. Defaults to None.

  • out_dir_path (str, optional) – Path of the directory in which the output pickle file should be stored. Defaults to None.

Raises

TypeError – Raised when both or none among ‘out_file_path’ and ‘out_dir_path’ is of NoneType.

Returns

None.

utils.pickle_dir_to_dfs(pickle_dir_path)[source]¶

Read a dataframes from all pickle files in a directory.

Parameters

  • pickle_dir_path (str) – Path of the directory containing the pickle

  • files. –

Returns

Dataframes of device details from all pickle files. Dictionary keys are strings specifying the file name. Their corresponding values are of type ‘pandas.DataFrame’

Return type

dict

Read a dataframe from a pickle file.

Parameters

pickle_file_path (str) – Path of the input pickle file.

Returns

Dataframe of device details.

Return type
